metadata.title: CVE-2023-0121 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting allversions starting from 13.2.4 before 15.10.8, all versions starting from15.11 before 15.11.7, all versions starting from 16.0 before 16.0.2 whichallows an attacker to cause high resource consumption using malicious testreport artifacts.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
